remarks: The domain and range of a one-to-one, onto function are equinumerous. This variation of ~ f1oeng does not require the Axiom of Replacement. (Contributed by NM, 13-Jan-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2015.)
statement: f1oen3g $p |- ( ( F e. V /\ F : A -1-1-onto-> B ) -> A ~~ B ) $.
